website_summaries.verdict: Let your pets lie on this mat and they will feel the coolness. Regulates pets' core body temperature.
pros: Weight and pressure- activated to keep coolness for up to three hours
Can also be used in crates, dog beds, and kennels
Easy to wipe up and clean
cons: Blue color may not be suitable for most furnishings
Sizes could be too small for some pets

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I've had four of these dog mats for four of my basset hounds--from puppy to grown dog. They love it, and relax on it when they are chewing treats or just relaxing in the sun. They are sturdy, cool, and comfortable. Well worth the money paid!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dogs cool
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and my 2 dogs love to lay on the patio. I bought one a few years ago, but I finally found them again. Great item
customer_reviews.author: MELODY ROOTH

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooling bed, we got medium size but I would prefer large as the puppy is months old and the bed is too short for him already. It is easy to clean and feels comfortable to the touch. Unfortunately, our dog does not want to sleep/lay/sleep on it unless I put a blanket over it. Otherwise very good purchase and well spend money.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This was a total mis communicated product ...there is no cooling feature to this mat - it allows air flow and that is it. However they rated this with the gel cooling pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kolton S.

customer_reviews.title: dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Its really hard to tell how well this works. You cannot feel any coolness but I put it in an outdoor shaded crate that I have for my mini doodle to be in while I am in the pool. She does appear to like it and lays on it when she is in the crate.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works but not chew proof
customer_reviews.text: This was nice while it lasted. One of our dogs was able to rip the seem open and started to pull apart the inside (which is like a plastic material). I think we had it for a couple of day’s before they ripped it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This item was sent to us used and ripped up and full of dog urine. The photo is how it was when removed from the package
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE PARTLOW

customer_reviews.title: My dogs happy!
customer_reviews.text: I received this little mat from the company after purchasing a different one. They sent me a nice coupon code so I could try it out for free. Basically just paid for the tax. I've had this a few months now. And my dog is still using it. Both Mats are stacked to give him a comfortable spot to lay on. He goes back to it every day to lay on it. So that must mean he loves it! Still in tact. No problem with quality either.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua princess approved.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my chihuahua. It’s a nice size and thickness. Looks very cozy and she really likes it. Idk if it keeps her cool but it’s not very warm here yet so I’m not really able to assess that feature at this point. Even still it’s a nice addition to her majesty’s many comfie spots.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and more important the puppy approved
customer_reviews.text: I received this at a discount but it does not affect my review as my puppy clearly loves this mat. It's big so it will allow your dog to stretch out and play.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice cooling pad for my puppy. I can’t wait to see how it works this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy
